llm_res.rule: totalSupply: Returns the total token supply.
llm_res.violation: The totalSupply function adds an arbitrary number (784) to the total supply, which is not compliant with the ERC20 standard.

llm_res.rule: allowance: Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
llm_res.violation: The allowance function adds an arbitrary number (397) to the allowance, which is not compliant with the ERC20 standard.
